body_html:
@renxida I assume you are using different model directories for every Estimator? The open FileWriters are cached in FileWriterCache, you could manually clear it which I think should close the open file handles: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/summary/FileWriterCache

@asimshankar I'm working on Estimator changes that will cause it to stop using FileWriterCache which should probably reduce the likelihood of this issue, though I haven't looked at that aspect of the change in particular.

body:
@renxida I assume you are using different model directories for every Estimator?  The open FileWriters are cached in FileWriterCache, you could manually clear it which I think should close the open file handles: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/summary/FileWriterCache

@asimshankar I'm working on Estimator changes that will cause it to stop using FileWriterCache which should probably reduce the likelihood of this issue, though I haven't looked at that aspect of the change in particular.
